about_the_game:
Poop Rocket is a casual game shooting your way through debris and aliens before the poop power meter runs out.  Avoid the debris and aliens, or you'll take damage and die.  The game is controlled with your keyboard.   Use the arrows to navigate and the space bar to drop bombs on enemies.  The game is currently on one level.  Go for your highest score with each play.  Enjoy this sci-fi 2-D shooter with custom hand-drawn assets.   To learn about the commander of Poop Rocket, read below. 

Commander Smigo, an unremarkable fellow with an unpredictable stomach, found himself on a routine mission to scout habitable planets. Fate had a different plan. In the midst of his voyage, Smigo's rocket suffered a catastrophic explosion while he was nestled in the ship's restroom. Miraculously shielded by the bathroom's sturdy walls, Smigo survived the blast but was marooned in the vast expanse of space

Now adrift, Smigo's only means of propulsion came from his incessant need to relieve himself. This bodily function would serve as his sole weapon and defense mechanism against the perils of space. Amidst the swirling debris and lurking extraterrestrial dangers, Smigo's journey is fraught with peril.

To complicate matters further, Smigo has to carefully manage his intake of sustenance and coffee to sustain his constant bodily activity. In the vacuum of space, every sip and morsel could mean the difference between survival and death.

As Smigo navigates the cosmos, he faces a myriad of challenges, from evading space junk to fending off lost alien entities. Yet, with his indomitable spirit and a peculiar arsenal of poop, Smigo ventured forth, determined to conquer the unknown and locate a new planet to call home.
